alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 26 at 11:01AM CDT until March 26 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Dallas County in south central Alabama... * Until noon CDT. * At 1101 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dannelly Reservoir, or 9 miles north of Camden, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dallas Lake, Belknap, Dannelly Reservoir, Carlowville, Minter and Tilden. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for south central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
